content: Visual Computing Lab @ SKKUSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationIntroWelcome to VCLab@SKKUVisual Computing Laboratory at Sungkyunkwan University (VCLab@SKKU) conducts research in Computer Vision and Machine Learning.We are looking for highly motivated undergraduate, M.S., and Ph. D. students who want to enjoy the cutting-edge research. Please contact Jae-Pil Heo if you are interested in research in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, or other related areas.Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
